0111101000000101 0001010001100000 1 -> sum: 1000111001100110, cout: 0

0011011110101100 1010010010011010 1 -> sum: 1101110001000111, cout: 0
0000101100001100 0001010100111011 1 -> sum: 0010000001001000, cout: 0
0110111001111110 1110101100100100 1 -> sum: 0101100110100011, cout: 1
